pages.text: The Threshold setting is only available on redstone card input.

Toggling this setting will open two buttons: Threshold Limit and Output. The channel will emit no redstone signal unless there is a signal that is equal to, or higher than the Limit. When this happens a signal equal to the Output will be put into the chosen channel.$(br2)This setting works with the $(l:laserio:redstone_invert)Redstone Channel$(/l).
